mapper.select: select * from (select reReply.* from (select * from review_reply order by re_ref asc,re_step desc) reReply) where post_id = #{post_id} order by re_ref, re_regdate
mapper.update: update review_reply set re_content=#{re_content}, re_regdate=sysdate where re_id=#{re_id}
mapper.insert: insert into re_review_report (report_id, reason, re_id, report_date) values (re_review_report_seq.nextval, #{reason}, #{re_id}, sysdate)
